review: Would like to see more apps, especially the Time Warner Cable app. Also using with "good" signal strength which causes loss of network. Maybe the Fire Stick could have a better antenna. I am adding an extender with the hope of curing my network issues.
author: Jim Philleo

review: I love it.it is great. I am going to get another one.
author: judy white

review: Works like magic! Easy to install and navigate. I like it better than the Google Chrome
author: tim nguyen

review: I really like the concept of the Fire TV stick.  It's only sticking point is that it needs to be located with a TV that is close to your Wi-Fi network box as that is the only way to get it to work consistently.  Other than that, it is easy to set up, easy to use and is a great way to enhance your viewing experience with not only your Amazon Prime membership, but those of Netflix, Hulu and others as well.  Well done.
author: Ali1023

review: too many additional subscriptions for TV shows and episodes and prime didn't cover a lot of the shows that I wanted to watch without a fee
author: Pamela J Ledsinger

review: Good and pretty fast. I face one issue with crackle app. It throws me error some time. But the fir stick is awesome and i love it :)
author: Umashankar

review: Easy to install. Up and watching within minutes!
author: Shirley Petronaci
